extensionContent.name: Get started integrating Rational Team Concert and ClearQuest

link.label: Help: Get started integrating Rational Team Concert and ClearQuest
link.text: Rational Team Concert includes several tools to help you get integrated with Rational ClearQuest: a ClearQuest Connector that synchronizes work items with ClearQuest records; a ClearQuest Bridge that allows you to view, search, modify, and track ClearQuest records from Rational Team Concert; and a tool for importing records from a ClearQuest user database into a project area.
